ygData.subject: RE: Lambent Lament
ygData.msgSnippet: i ve picked up 2 of em for 15pp each so far, so i always keep abit of cash on me, and every time i zone i advertize.... it pays off as you can see. Minkin sol

i've picked up 2 of em for 15pp each so far, so i always keep abit of cash
